Texts.Eng: A desk with some pixels and valuable information.
Texts.Chs: 有一些像素和有价值的信息的书桌。

Texts.Eng: A marked map is pinned to the back of this barrel wood desk.
Texts.Chs: 这张木桶书桌的背面别着一张有标记的地图。

Texts.Eng: Floran will beat pirates to treasure and ssstab them first!
Texts.Chs: 叶族人会先把海盗打到宝藏然后再杀了他们！

Texts.Eng: I do hope there weren't any civilians in these marked areas.
Texts.Chs: 我真希望这些标记区域没有平民。

Texts.Eng: Perhaps I can intercept at their next hit.
Texts.Chs: 也许我能在他们下一次击中时拦截。

Texts.Eng: The map on this desk has several points of interest circled...
Texts.Chs: 这张书桌上的地图上圈出了几个有趣的地方。。。

Texts.Eng: This map has several areas crossed out. Were those treasure... or targets?
Texts.Chs: 这张地图划掉了几个区域。那些宝藏。。。还是目标？

Texts.Eng: X marks the spot, right? Or did they already strike there?
Texts.Chs: X标记了点，对吗？还是他们已经袭击了那里？
